org.trimou.engine.resolver

Interface Resolver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConfigurationAware, WithPriority
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EnhancedResolver
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractResolver, ArrayIndexResolver, CombinedIndexResolver, DateTimeFormatResolver, DummyTransformResolver, IndexResolver, ListIndexResolver, LocaleAwareResolver, MapCustomKeyResolver, MapResolver, NumberFormatResolver, ReflectionResolver, ResourceBundleResolver, ThisResolver, TransformResolver

    public interface Resolver
extends WithPriority, ConfigurationAware
    A value resolver. Implementations must be thread-safe.

    Any resolver may implement optional interface Validateable. The validation is performed before a MustacheEngine is built. An invalid resolver is not put into service, i.e. it's not included in the final list of resolvers returned by Configuration.getResolvers().

    Author:
    Martin Kouba

    • Method Detail

      • resolve

        Object resolve(Object contextObject,
               String name,
               ResolutionContext context)
        Resolve the value from specified context object and name. This method should return as fast as possible. The best practice is to verify params first and return null in case of the resolver is not capable of resolving it.

        ResolutionContext allows to register a callback to release all the relevant resources after the resolved value is used.

        Parameters:
        contextObject - The current context object (aka base object), may be null
        name - The name (the key or its part) is never null
        context - The current resolution context
        Returns:
        the resolved object or null
        See Also:
        Placeholder.NULL

      • getPriority

        default int getPriority()
        Specified by:
        getPriority in interface WithPriority
        Returns:
        the priority value
